Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum [inherited]
 

Enumerator:
ID 

Reimplemented from Control.

enum FlowLayout::Alignment [inherited]
 

Describes the alignment of a component inside the horizontal or vertical flow layout control.

Enumerator:
Start  The component is aligned on the left (top) of a horizontal (vertical) flow layout control.
Middle  The component is aligned in the middle of a flow layout control.
End  The component is aligned on the right (bottom) of a horizontal (vertical) flow layout control.

enum ScrollBehavior
 

Defines the the scrollbehavior of menus, trees and grids when changing the selection.

See also:
ItemMenu

ItemTree

ItemGrid

Enumerator:
DefaultBehavior  A line-by-line scrolling will be done if the selection reachs the top or bottom of the visible area. If the selection reaches the begin or end of all items, no scrolling is done. The scroll gap defined in OptionalConfig::GetSetting is respected.
BlockScrollBehavior  Same behavior as the DefaultBehavior, but if the top or bottom of the visible area has been reached, the items are not scrolled line-by-line but per page.
RotateBehavior  Same behavior as the DefaultBehavior, but if the selection reaches the begin or end of all items, the selection will be rotated to the other end of the list. The scroll gap defined in OptionalConfig::GetSetting is respected.
EndlessLoopBehavior  The items will be treated like a ring buffer: if the last item is selected, the next visible item is the first item. If the scroll gap defined in OptionalConfig::GetSetting is -1, the selection will always stay at the vertical center of the visible area.

Function Documentation

void FlowLayout::AddAlignInfo (  Component &  comp,
Alignment  align
)  [inherited]
 

Adds alignment information for a component. If no alignment information is given each component is aligned with 'Start' as default alignment. The components are aligned in the same order as the alignment information has been added.

Parameters:
comp Component for which the alignment information is given.
align Alignment property.

const WCHAR* AmbiguousTr (  const WCHAR *  text,
INT  ambiguous_hint
) 
 

Translates the text text and returns the corresponding text dependend on the current set language. If no language-table is provided, text itself is returned. Use this method instead of Tr(), when the text has different translations in different contexts and provide an index by ambiguous_hint.

Parameters:
text Pointer to the text which should be translated.
ambiguous_hint It is possible that one text may have different translations in different contexts. ambiguous_hint indicates the index of the context starting with zero. The default value is -1, which means that there is a 1 to 1 relation between the text and it's translations.
Returns:
Pointer to translated text.
See also:
LanguageMangager::Tr

FlowLayout::FlowLayout (  Control *  parent,
BOOLEAN  horizontal = TRUE
)  [inherited]
 

Parameters:
parent Parent control, where the flow layout control is embedded.
horizontal If set to TRUE the flow of the layout is aligned horizontally, otherwise vertically.

FlowLayout::FlowLayout (   )  [inherited]
 

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.

BOOLEAN FlowLayout::GetAlignInfo (  const Component &  comp,
Alignment &  align
)  const [inherited]
 

Returns the alignment information for a given component.

Parameters:
comp Component for which the alignment information should be getted.
align Output parameter which contains the alignment information. The parameter is only valid if TRUE has been returned.
Returns:
TRUE if the alignment information was available.

BOOLEAN FlowLayout::RemoveAlignInfo (  const Component &  comp  )  [inherited]
 

Removes the alignment information for the given component. If the component has no alignment information, it is aligned with 'Start' as default alignment.

Parameters:
comp Component for which the alignment information should be removed.
Returns:
TRUE if removing has been successful. FALSE is returned if the no alignment information could be found for the given component.

BOOLEAN FlowLayout::SetProperty (  ResourceParser &  parser,
const GuiObjectFactory::PropertyId  prop_id
)  [inherited]
 

Used by Aragon to fill the properties by reading out a resource file. It should not be necessary for the application developer to invoke this method in a direct manner.

Reimplemented from Control.

const WCHAR* Tr (  const WCHAR *  text  ) 
 

Translates the text text and returns the corresponding text dependend on the current set language. If no language-table is provided, text itself is returned. Because this method is used very often and has no semantics to the code, the short name Tr was choosen instead of Translate.

Parameters:
text Pointer to the text which should be translated.
Returns:
Pointer to translated text.
See also:
LanguageMangager::Tr
